    Field and Description
    org.netbeans.api.editor.settings.SimpleValueNames.CARET_COLOR_INSERT_MODE
    Use FontColorNames#CARET_INSERT_MODE_COLORING.
    org.netbeans.api.editor.settings.SimpleValueNames.CARET_COLOR_OVERWRITE_MODE
    Use FontColorNames#CARET_OVERWRITE_MODE_COLORING.

    Use FontColorNames#DOCUMENTATION_POPUP_COLORING
    org.netbeans.api.editor.settings.FontColorSettings.PROP_FONT_COLORS
    This should have never been made public. Nobody can listen on this property.
    org.netbeans.api.editor.settings.SimpleValueNames.TEXT_LIMIT_LINE_COLOR
    Use FontColorNames#TEXT_LIMIT_LINE_COLORING
